document.full_text: telecom equipment maker alcatel-lucent  sees no end in sight to booming demand in the united states as major operators invest to keep up with a data overload driven by smartphones and streaming video.
document.title: alcatel-lucent says demand to remain strong in u.s.
lines_and_colors: telecom equipment maker alcatel-lucent  sees no end in sight to booming demand in the united states as major operators invest to keep up with a data overload driven by smartphones and streaming video.
